result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CASES: 20CT69 & 20TR929.  9:19 AM Defendant Ryan C Golden not in court.  Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk.  Def does not appear. Def did not apply for a ct appt attorney after last hearing. ADA requests warrant, and a default on TR file.  CT issues warrant on CT file- geo to WI. 
On 20TR929- based on non-appr, NC plea entered. CT finds def G. CT orders $175.30 forf. 60 dtp or set up PP with COCC.  9:22 am adj.  
Back on 9:26 am. Def has now called in to JA, transferred call into courtroom. CT reviews status. CT quashes warrant. Def is advised of options to obtain counsel. To contact PD's office to see if he qualifies for representation, def is given their phone number. If does not qualify for representation, and unable to hire own attorney, def may apply for ct appt attorney. Must return notarized petition to Br 1 JA no later than 1/29/21 if applying for a ct appt attorney. Bond cont. 9:33 am adj.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 5, 2021 at 04:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on January 11, 2021 at 09:15 am.

Defendant Ryan C Golden appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp appeared for State of Wisconsin. 2:18 p.m. AO-Clerk. De states he has not rec'd copy of CC. COCC to mail CC & petition for ct. appt'd counsel to Defendant. JA to schedule PTC. 2:21 p.m. adj.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 14, 2020 at 02:00 pm.
Absolute Sobriety.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.

CASES: 20CT69 & 20TR929. Kevin Thomas Schmidt appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Ryan C Golden appeared by video means. 2:15 p.m. AO-Clerk. De plea NG to 20TR929. 20CT69 - De to contact PD office to see if he qualifies. If de does not qualify, to file Petition for ct appt'd atty by 9/7/2020. Ct sets bond. De to sign bond at COCC by 4:00 p.m. on 8/28/2020. 2:18 p.m. adj.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 14, 2020 at 02:00 pm.
